Irritable Bowel Syndrome - Abdominal Pain - Treatments

Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is a functional disorder having the symptoms like bloating, cramping, abdominal pain, constipation, and diarrhea. The Irritable Bowel Syndrome affects the parts of digestive tracks like Large Bowel or Colon causing discomfort & distress.

Visit : http://blog.internationaldrugmart.com/index.php/2010/10/19/irritable-bowel-syndrome-abdominal-pain-treatments/ for more info

Affordable Generic Medications for Hypothyroidism

Hypothyroidism is a situation when the thyroid glands produce insufficient amount of thyroid hormone. The main function of thyroid hormone is to maximize the basal metabolic rate, helps in the regulation of long bone growth, heat generation, in the hibernation cycle & also in many other functions. When the thyroid hormone is secreted meanly, lot of physical & psychological problems can be caused.

For example, the hyperthyroid causes the thickening in the endometrium in females, which results in irregular periods & also may affect the reproductive system of the women. Another effect of hyperthyroidism is the increase in Basal Metabolic rate, which makes the person obese.

International Drug Mart has added very affordable new generic medications for hyperthyroidism to the product list.

Also Discounts were announced on purchase of tablets in 200, 300 & 400 packs.

http://blog.internationaldrugmart.com/index.php/2010/11/23/affordable-generic-medications-for-hypothyroidism/

Ayurveda & Doshas – What are you?

The destiny of life is achieved not only by living but also to find the meaning of life… The Meaning of life is accomplished by living healthier & happy life.

Ayurveda – The nature’s gift, splits the fundamental of physical world into five elements – Earth, Water, Fire, Air, Space. These five elements combine to form three basic energies (Doshas) in the biological form.

Based upon these Doshas medicines are been

They are:

* Vata Dosha (Air + Space)
* Pitta Dosha (Water + Fire)
* Kapha Dosha (Water + Earth)

These Doshas provides the physical characteristic of a individual person & also regulates the physical functioning.

They help regulate physical functioning within our body, besides providing us with our individual physical characteristics. These Doshas also have the tendency to prone the sufferings of our health condition.

TO FIND OUT WHAT DOSHA YOU ARE, VISIT : http://blog.internationaldrugmart.com/index.php/2011/01/23/ayurveda-doshas-what-are-you/

World Tuberculosis Day 2011

“On the move against TB: Transforming the fight towards elimination”

Every year on March 24, “World Tuberculosis Day” is been celebrated to create awareness on million of people dying every year on TB. The main aim of celebrating World TB Days is to Identifying persons having TB and giving them DOT’s Treatment.
